name: Blocks/Off
description:
Blocks/Off is a Breakout-clone made for learning purposes.  The game has 9 stages with steep-difficulty increases at stage 4 and 7.

Blocks/Off is game #1 of my 12 games in 12 months challenge. A detailed Devlog will be available very soon on my Youtube channel.

Controls: Keyboard

  • Move Paddle: Keyboard WASD or arrows.
  • Release ball: Keyboard Space.

Feedback much appreciated. Thank you!
